features: 【Feel The Coolness】Features dual fans to maximize air movement and deliver strong airflow throughout the stuffy space in high summer. 3 speed options (high-medium-low) provide tailored cooling-off experience to beat the heat.

【110° Widespread Oscillation】A simple press on the “swing” button allows the tower fan to oscillate horizontally for 110 degrees, sweeping more areas in the room with smooth breeze for effective personal cooling.
【3 Auto-Off Timers】Comes with 3 timer options, including 2H, 4H, and 8H, to enable this desk fan to circulate muggy air at night for improved ventilation and lasting coolness at your bedside.
【Whisper-Quiet Cooling】Produces a right amount of white noises (less than 60db) even if the tower fan projects high-velocity airflow, bringing maximum comfort to you for a sound sleep.

【Energy-Efficient Choice】Equipped with a 16W high-performance motor to create a stream of powerful airflow, while using less energy than tower fans of other brands. For any questions or concerns about this desk fan, please feel free to contact with us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 16W Fan — Super Low Power Consumption Amazing! Lasting use of nearly 60 hours consumes just 1 kWh. Don't miss it for your upcoming summer adventures! Outdoor Adventure Essentials Compact and portable, suits for any narrow space. AC power cord (length: 4.6 ft) Rated voltage: 100-120V 50 / 60Hz

Smart Auto-Off Timers Equipped with 3 timer options (2 / 4 / 8 hours), no need to worry about catching a cold or high electricity bills. 110° Auto-Oscillation Share the coolness with everyone. An optimal choice to quickly cool off stuffy rooms. 3-Speed Customized Cooling Enjoy the gentle breeze with the proper amount of airflow. Drift into your sweet dreams with ease. Ultra-Quiet Cooling Perfect for reading or sleeping — without unpleasant noise or distractions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great small tower fan
reviews.reviewText: The DR. Prepare Tower Fan is a refreshing addition to any space, offering a perfect blend of style and functionality. Its sleek design complements modern aesthetics, while the three-speed settings and oscillation feature ensure customizable airflow for optimal comfort. The built-in timer is a thoughtful addition for energy efficiency and nighttime use. Beyond its cooling capabilities, the tower fan operates quietly, making it suitable for office environments, bedrooms, or shared living spaces. With its space-saving vertical design and user-friendly features, the DR. Prepare Tower Fan stands out as a reliable and stylish cooling solution for various settings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Personal Fan with Excellent Power
reviews.reviewText: I bought this fan to replace a 2 speed name brand clip-on fan whose clip broke. I gave this one a shot and have NO regrets. In fact, I LOVE IT. It is the perfect personal fan to set by a table side and direct or oscillate the air. Having 2 separate blades seems like a plus, as on all speeds it provides impressive air movement. The highest speed is enough for a small bedroom. I have found the lowest speed prefect for tabletop use next to the couch. I also use it when I'm on Zoom calls, simply place it behind my computer and I have a constant breeze. The noise level on low speed is quieter than most other fans but still present. However, it's never heard on my computer calls. Highest speed I can see being good for low white noise. Oscillation feature is great bonus, and timer as well (which I haven't really used). Could have a slightly longer cord. Overall, super pleased with this item, and would buy another, as long as it doesn't break. Definitely a perfect step up from an electric personal clip-on fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Little Fan
reviews.reviewText: My computer room gets a little hotter than the rest of the house even with central air, I wanted a direct fan that did not take up a lot of space, but still oscillated and move the air around. This totally fit the bill.There are 3 speeds, the real high one is a little loud, but moves some air. I usually keep it on medium, it makes for a nice mix of quiet and still works well. I liked it so much, I bought one for my shop.I can't vouch for longevity yet, but they get a lot of use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small But Efficient
reviews.reviewText: When I ordered this Dr. Prepare fan, I thought it would be a bit bigger so when I received it, I was quite dismayed with the size. Just look at the picture I attached, which shows a comparison of how big and tall this Dr. Prepare fan is along with a bottle of Dasani water and a Monsterarts GMK Godzilla toy. It's as tall as two Godzilla toys and 1 and 3/4 of a standard Dasani bottle. I thought it would be a very weak fan. Thankfully this Dr. Prepare fan proved to be much better than what my initial disappointment led me to believe.It has three levels of fan speed, low - medium - high. The only one that matters to me is the high setting because it provides the best cooling experience for me. The high setting can actually be felt from a few feet away, which is good!As for the noise level, there is barely any sound coming from it at the highest level at all. It's an extremely silent fan so you can easily fall asleep if you want peace and quiet. When I tested this on the first night of getting it, I actually forgot that it existed because I couldn't hear it.This fan oscillates at quite a slow pace. Due to how small this fan is, I consider it more as a personal fan, so the oscillating function isn't really something useful to me, it's simply there as an extra option.As for the timer, I don't use it. I prefer having the fan on at all times until I find the need to turn it off.The only fault that I can find about this fan is how short its power cord is. I estimate it's only around 5 or 6 feet long so you can't use it very far away from an electric outlet.In conclusion, although it's a small fan, it does perform its job very well. The air coming out from the two fans is refreshing and quite strong at the highest setting. There is really no noise that can be complained about, it's really a very silent fan. Because of its small size but satisfying air flow, you can easily put this anywhere you can, as long as there is a nearby power outlet.Since it performs way better than what I expected it to be, this Dr. Prepare fan gets a perfect score from me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Delivers a strong steady stream of cool air on all three speeds.
reviews.reviewText: The price is very good. A very well made product and works very good even when used for long times on multiple days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I like it but…..
reviews.reviewText: I like the size, the air flow and everything about it EXCEPT it’s driving me insane with this little noise it started making and now it’s worse. It started like a click click but now it clicks and sounds like if you were ripping tiny paper. It’s odd and I can hear it in my sleep. I don’t want the hassle of returning it but I might because it’s like a dripping faucet kind of annoying

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fan for my home office
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought this fan for my home office and I'm very happy with it. It's easy to set up and use, and it has three speed settings to adjust the airflow. It's also very quiet, which is great for working or sleeping. The fan oscillates smoothly and covers a wide area. It's also lightweight and portable, so I can move it around the house if I need to. The design is sleek and modern, and it doesn't take up much space on my desk. I would recommend this fan to anyone looking for a good portable fan at a reasonable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Best for close up and stationary
reviews.reviewText: This is the second one of these I have purchased. So maybe I should have given it five stars but it’s not good when oscillating. It is more of a personal fan that needs to be closer than most to feel the air. It’s not for cooling even a small room or circulating air in a space. However, it is perfect for my upper body close to my desk as it cools my face and is quiet. It only lasted a couple of years which is why I bought the new one but to be fair it as on 24/7 365. I had tried a small USB fan but it didn’t even last a year and I hardly used it as I go into the offices once or twice a week and don’t need it most of the time. I use this at home and most of the time it sits right next to my husband in our sun room focused directly on him while he watches TV. It is quiet.
ME HA SIDO DE MUCHA UTILIDAD, MUY BUEN FUNCIONAMIENTO Y ALCANCE.TAN SATISFACTORIO ES, QUE HE COMPRADO OTRO.SÓLO UN PERO LE PONGO: SI TUVIERA CONTROL REMOTO, SERÍA ¡¡¡perfecto!!!!

This is a great fan... when it's not clicking and popping when it oscillates. It's more powerful than similar fans, it moves more air, but the clicking sound is extremely irritating. Seeing as I'm not the only one that's experienced this with this particular fan, I wouldn't recommend purchasing it. I should add that the company selling this fan was really great about returning it. They were prompt in their reply to a refund request and I appreciated how easy it was.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great power for the small size
reviews.reviewText: It is a cold air fan, that’s why got 1 star on the warmth field. I find it very good looking and it works great. Great airflow and power. I only used it at lower speed as it’s more than enough for what I need it. I got a very cheap one first with similar characteristics but had to return it right away as you could nearly feel anything. The only problem I found, is that if you have it on a timer, when it turns back on, it turn on high speed and no oscillation until you change it manually. Would be nice if started in the same settings that was turn off.At low speed is very quiet and it gets a bit more noisy at high speed but not as bad as other fans I tried for the amount of air you get. Would recommend it for sure.
Fan didn't move much air at all. Fan was returned.
